SCTX - Script Source:
scn mwFnInitialize

ref rTemp

begin Function { }

	if FileExists "Data\ini\Morroblivion.ini"
		RunBatchScript "Data\ini\Morroblivion.ini"
	else
		set MorroDefaultQuest.QuestMarkersEnabled to 1
		set MorroDefaultQuest.HardcoreHarvestMuck to 0
		set MorroDefaultQuest.HardcoreHarvestOre to 0
		set MorroDefaultQuest.TauntEnabled to 1
		set MorroDefaultQuest.FastTravelEnabled to 1
	endif

	if (FileExists "Data\Ini\MorroblivionLevitation.ini")
		RunBatchScript "Data\Ini\MorroblivionLevitation.ini"
	else
		set JDLevitationData.accBaseFact to 1.0
		set JDLevitationData.accWeakFact to 0.5
		set JDLevitationData.accStrongFact to 2.0
		set JDLevitationData.accWildFact to 4.0 
		set JDLevitationData.dampBaseFact to 1.0
		printc "MorroblivionLevitation.ini was not found in Data/Ini. Acceleration and damping coefficients were set to default values."
	endif

	if MorroDefaultQuest.FastTravelEnabled
		SetCanFastTravelFromWorld WrldMorrowind 1
	else
		SetCanFastTravelFromWorld WrldMorrowind 0
	endif

	set mwServices.fQuestDelayTime to 0.5
	set mwTeleportManager.fQuestDelayTime to 1

	if GetGameRestarted
		SetEventHandler "OnActivate" mwNPCActivateHandler "activatingRef"::PlayerRef
		SetEventHandler "OnHit" mwBlightTransmissionFunc "ref"::PlayerRef
	endif

;	if IsModLoaded "Morrowind_ob - UCWUS.esp"
;		Let rTemp := GetFormFromMod "Morrowind_ob - UCWUS.esp" 04A846
;		Call rTemp
;	endif

	SetStringGameSettingEX "sLoadingArea|%e" ;This has nothing to do with Morroblivion, but bloody hell, this "Loading area..." message is annoying

	Print "Morroblivion: Initialization Completed."
end
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 1383 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
